data.Name: Ziggy Marley
data.Bio: David Nesta "Ziggy" Marley (born October 17, 1968 in Saint Ann Parish, ghetto of Trenchtown, Jamaica), composer, singer and guitarist, is a multiple Grammy-winning (reggae) Jamaican musician. He is known for songs like "Tomorrow People", "Love Is My Religion" and "A Lifetime", He is the oldest son in the marriage between the singer Rita Anderson (Marley) and late legendary reggae Bob Marley. David's father Bob nicknamed him "Ziggy". A ziggy is a big marijuana spliff on Jamaiaca. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Ziggy Marley & Stephen Marley and Ben Harper & The Innocent Criminals
data.Subtitle: with very special guests
data.Description:
ZIGGY MARLEY & STEPHEN MARLEY and BEN HARPER & THE INNOCENT CRIMINALS at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on May 30th, 2021 has been rescheduled to May 29th, 2022. 

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.

 

AEG Presents is thrilled to announce ZIGGY MARLEY & STEPHEN MARLEY and BEN HARPER & THE INNOCENT CRIMINALS live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Sunday May 29th, 2022.
